root.strong: Delivery time depends on which wholesaler you are buying from:

ul.li: Across Continents: Favourably priced items are often offered by wholesalers based in Dubai, Asia and sometimes Europe. If you live in Africa, it would usually take 10-30 days for delivery.
Local Wholesaler: If the wholesaler resides in the same country then it would usually take 1-3 working days.

Final Say: The final say rests with the wholesaler and this should usually be indicated in the productâ€™s details. Feel free to contact the wholesaler directly. click here for how to contact the seller.
